basic.Peptide Name: M-lycotoxin-Hc1a (M-LCTX-Hc1a; Lycotoxin I; spiders, Arthropods, animals)
basic.Target Organism: Gram-positive bacteria:Bacillus thuringiensis subsp. Israelensis (MIC<5.0 µM);Gram-negative bacteria:Escherichia coli D31 (MIC=10-20 µM), Escherichia coli DH5 (MIC=80-150 µM).Fungi:Candida glabrata ATCC 2001 (MIC=100-150 µM), Candida albicans clinical isolate (MIC=100-200 µM).
